meanings.definition: A person or thing that shapes or molds something incorrectly or in a negative way.
meanings.sent1: The misshapers of the clay left it lumpy and uneven.
meanings.sent2: The misshapers of the story twisted the truth to suit their agenda.
meanings.sent3: The misshapers of the cake accidentally added salt instead of sugar.
meanings.sent4: The misshapers of society are those who spread hate and division.
meanings.sent5: The misshapers of the garden turned it into a chaotic mess.

meanings.definition: Those who distort or alter the appearance or form of something.
meanings.sent1: The misshapers of the painting added strange colors that clashed.
meanings.sent2: The misshapers of reality created a false image of what truly happened.
meanings.sent3: The misshapers of fashion decided that wearing socks with sandals was trendy.
meanings.sent4: The misshapers of the truth twisted facts until they were unrecognizable.
meanings.sent5: The misshapers of the sculpture gave it a surreal and unsettling look.
